required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmcodynamics of ILV-094 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Ascending Single Dose Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetiks, and Pharmacodynamics of ILV-094 Administered Intravenously and One Dose of ILV-094 Administered Subcutaneously to Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer

clinical_study.source: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer

brief_summary.textblock: This a randomized, double-blind placebo-controlled inpatient/outpatient, sequential group study of ascending single IV doses of ILV-094, an investigational drug, administered to healthy subjects. In addition, there will be one sub-cutaneous dose cohort, which will follow the 25 mg IV dose.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmcodynamics

criteria.textblock:
- Healthy subjects (Men or women of nonchildbearing potential ), aged 18 to 50 years.
- Body mass index in the range of 18 to 30 Kg/m2 and body weight greater than 50 Kg.
- Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of medical history, physical examination, clinical laboratory test results, vital signs, and 12-lead electrocardiogram.

overall_official.affiliation: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer
